settings.button_label_1: SAVE $400 & BOOK NOW WITH 3 FREE MONTHS OF ULTRABURN

settings.heading: THE BODY YOU WANT, DOWN TO THE LAST CURVE
settings.title: truSculpt® iD Thermal Fat Reduction
settings.body: Balanced Aesthetics Medspa is excited to bring our clients truSculpt® iD, a revolutionary non-surgical, body-sculpting treatment that sculpts your ideal body in as little as one 15-minute treatment. truSculpt® iD is clinically proven to reduce fat cells in stubborn areas around your abdomen and flanks. Get the body definition you want, even in areas that have been resistant to diet and exercise, with truSculpt® iD.

settings.text: This revolutionary technology is available for a broader range of body types and skin conditions than other body contouring systems on the market, so most men and women can shape their physiques to reach their body contouring goals. Schedule a consultation with Balanced Aesthetics to learn more.

It does take time to filter the damaged fat cells from the body, so you may not see visible results until around 3 weeks. Measurable loss of fat will peak at 12 weeks from the first treatment. If you’ve scheduled additional treatments, you can expect this timeline to continue after each session. The best part is fat cells don’t replenish themselves after puberty, so the fat you’ve lost with truSculpt® iD is gone for good.

settings.question: How Does truSculpt® iD Work?
settings.answer: The power behind truSculpt® iD is the monopolar radiofrequency (RF) technology, which therapeutically heats fat cells to disrupt their membranes. The body then absorbs the damaged cells and filters them through the lymphatic system. Clinical studies show that, after a single treatment with truSculpt® iD, you can reduce your fat cells by up to 24% on average. With safety temperature regulation, truSculpt® iD ensures temperatures at the surface remain comfortable while the RF energy reaches therapeutic heat to disrupt fat cells. truSculpt® iD can treat clients who may not be candidates for other body contouring procedures for reasons such as treatment location, fat thickness, or skin type and laxity. Get the body you’ve always wanted with truSculpt® iD.

settings.question: What is truSculpt® iD Treatment Like?
settings.answer: Many patients report truSculpt® iD is relaxing, almost like a hot stone massage, and there’s minimal discomfort involved. Treatment is fast, between 15-30 minutes, depending on the size of your treatment area. After your session is complete, you may return to your routine, including your usual exercise regimen. Most clients see visible improvement after a single session, but some may need to schedule 1-3 treatments to reach their desired body contouring goals.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: There is no downtime with truSculpt® iD, which is a significant improvement over surgical treatments such as liposuction. You may feel some tenderness or have some redness in the treatment area for a few days, but this resolves on its own.

settings.text: The frustration when your efforts to shape your body through diet and exercise is real, and not everyone has time for a lengthy recovery from a surgical body contouring procedure. Now, there’s truSculpt® iD, proven to reduce fat cells and shape your bodyexactly how you’ve always wanted—your way.
